file.description: Displays webcam feed, 'Let's Play' button, and language switcher at startup.
Handles legal consent before taking and saving photos.
Shows a countdown and tutorial overlay to guide user positioning before photo capture.
Displays the captured photo, allowing confirmation or retaking.
Main interface after initial photo validation, shows selected image, history of generated images, and item/category selection.
Allows user to switch languages at any time.
Displays clothing categories and triggers a modal for item selection.
Transparent modal listing available items for the selected category.
Handles communication with backend (Node.js/Express) for image saving and retrieval.
Defines routes for session creation, photo saving, and image retrieval.
Implements business logic for managing sessions and photos.
Interfaces with the image generation engine (AI) to create try-on outputs.
